title: Pakistan envoy presents credentials to Grand Duke of Luxembourg
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 26 (APP): The Ambassador of Pakistan to the European Union, Belgium and Luxembourg Amna Baloch on Thursday presented her credentials to the Grand Duke of Luxembourg at the Royal Palace of Luxembourg.
Conveying the warm greetings of the leadership of Pakistan, the ambassador expressed her resolve to continue efforts for further enhancing bilateral relations between the two countries.
In addition to presenting her credentials, the ambassador also met with the Secretary General of the Ministry of Foreign and European Affairs of Luxembourg, Ambassador Jean Olinger.
During the interaction, both sides discussed pathways for deepening engagement between Pakistan and Luxembourg. Patrick Nickels, Director General for Foreign Trade and Investment Promotion at the Luxembourg Ministry of the Economy was also present during the discussion.
The ambassador also hosted a networking activity which was attended by representatives of Luxembourg Chamber of Commerce, National Research Fund and CEO of ExoAtlet to discuss innovation linkages and trade partnerships.
The embassy hosted a meet and greet activity for the Pakistani community in Luxembourg to discuss possibilities and opportunities for enhancing Pakistanâ€™s footprint in Luxembourg.
